General.Name: Jolywood Suzhou Sunwatt Co Ltd
General.Description: Jolywood (Suzhou) Sunwatt Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells integrated photovoltaic (PV) products worldwide. It offers solar module backsheets, solar cells, and N-type bifacial solar cells. The company was formerly known as Jolywood (Suzhou) Solar Material Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jolywood (Suzhou) Sunwatt Co., Ltd. in 2011. Jolywood (Suzhou) Sunwatt Co., Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is based in Changzhou, China.
